title: The Murmur of a Bee
poem:
The Murmur of a Bee
A Witchcraft-yieldeth me-
If any ask me why-
'Twere easier to die-
Than tell-
The Red upon the Hill
Taketh away my will-
If anybody sneer-
Take care-for God is here-
That's all.
The Breaking of the Day
Addeth to my Degree-
If any ask me how-
Artist-who drew me so-
Must tell!
